Package controller

Class BookingManager

java.lang.Object
controller.BookingManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BookingManager extends Object implements Serializable
Handles the booking of tickets for a movie screening.
Since:
2022-10-30
Version:
1.1
Author:
Roy Leong, Ryan Ng

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • makeBooking

      public void makeBooking(MovieGoerAccount movieGoer, Screening screening, ArrayList<Seat> seatsArr, TicketType ticketType, SystemManager systemManager) throws Exception
      Creates a booking from the user's choice of screening and seats. Multiple tickets of the same type and screening can be created in a single booking. Selected seats will be checked for one-seat gap and if seats is/are taken, if found booking will not be made successfully
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - the moviegoer account making the booking
      screening - the screening that the moviegoer wishes to make the booking of
      seatsArr - the seats the moviegoer wishes to book
      ticketType - the type of ticket the moviegoer wishes to book
      systemManager - the systemmanager
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getAvailableSeats

      public ArrayList<Seat> getAvailableSeats(Screening screening)
      Returns all available seats for a given screening. Used to get the seats that the user can choose from, which is then shown to the user in the console.
      Parameters:
      screening - the specific screening to check for available seats
      Returns:
      availableSeats the ArrayList of available seats

    • getBookings

      public ArrayList<Booking> getBookings()
      Returns all bookings that have been made
      Returns:
      bookingsArr the ArrayList of bookings that have been made

    • setBookingsArr

      public void setBookingsArr(ArrayList<Booking> bookingsArr)

    • getBookingsByUser

      public ArrayList<Booking> getBookingsByUser(MovieGoerAccount movieGoer)
      Returns all bookings that have been made specifically by a movie goer
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - the moviegoer account that wants to get the bookings it has made
      Returns:
      checkArr the ArrayList of bookings made by the moviegoer

    • getBookingById

      public Booking getBookingById(String bookingId)
      Get the booking based on a given booking id
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the id of the wanted booking
      Returns:
      the booking that matches this booking id

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking(Screening screening)
      Cascade deletes bookings specific to a screening
      Parameters:
      screening - is the target screening of which bookings belong to a screening
